short_instructions.https://studio.code.org/s/infinity/stage: Hiro is "actor 1".  Use the Move block to move Hiro right to touch Baymax.
Make Anna say "Hi there." by using the Say block.
Baymax is "actor 2".  Add Move blocks and then move Baymax using the arrows.  Make him touch the two other characters.
Hiro is "actor 1".  Move him right to Baymax, and play a sound when they touch.
Make Anna score a point when she touches a snowflake.  Then click "Run" and steer her to touch each snowflake once.
Baymax is "actor 2".  Make Baymax throw a rocket at Hiro.
Hiro is "actor 3".  Make Hiro throw a projectile to each of the four characters.  Wait one second between each throw.
Use a "repeat forever" block to make Anna move up and down 400 pixels.
Can you make Elsa ("actor 2") catch up with Anna by using the arrow keys?
Create anything you like and share it!

https://studio.code.org/s/infinity/stage.Infinity_move_directions_callout: Which block will make Baymax move up when the up arrow is pressed?

https://studio.code.org/s/infinity/stage.Infinity_move_collide_callout: Play a sound when this event occurs.
